attributes.action: Prioritise knifecrime and tackle youth crime
attributes.background: Appears to be an increase in youth and knife crime - 2 fatal stabbings in 2 weeks within a few miles of each other (Poplar and Canning Town) More youth on youth robberies many not reported.  Needs prioritising and tackling effectively before more young people and families are affected.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of the local Police and Crime Commissioner.

You can find out more about PCCs and how to contact them using this website:

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
